name: emailMessage
message: Only users with .gov or .mil email addresses can currently register with the GSAXcess system.

name: email
label: Email Address*
helperText: You must supply your work Email address. Only users with .gov or .mil email addresses can currently register with the GSAXcess system. GSAXcess速 will edit the address. If your address is ineligible, you will see this message: "You are not authorized for self-registration to access GSAXcess速. Please contact the GSAXcess速 Help Desk, 1-866-333-7472 or gsaxcesshelp@gsa.gov". Contact the GSAXcess速 Help Desk for assistance if you receive this message.

name: password
label: Password*
helperText: Password must be between 8 and 16 characters and must contain atleast one numeric character, one lower case character, one upper case character and one special character.

name: passwordInfo
message: Password must be between 8 and 16 characters and must contain atleast on numberic, one lower case character, one upper case character and once special character.

name: securityQnInfo
message: Security Questions must be atleast 7 characters and Answers must be atleast 5 characters.

name: securityQn1
label: Security Question 1*
helperText: Security Questions must be atleast 7 characters and Answers must be atleast 5 characters.
